p: On the in vivo leaf surface, biseriate trichomes with secretions in the subcuticular space were observed (Fig. 3c). The histochemical staining showed that the secretion contained lipophilic substances (Fig. 3d, e). In the glandular secretions localized in the subcuticular space, neutral lipids/essential oils were also detected (Fig. 3f). The terpenoids, represented as dark violet droplets, referred to as essential oils, were localized in the secretory cells and subcuticular space (Fig. 3g, h).
